articles.title: COVID cases double among young people in Oxford following students’ return
articles.description: Some data analysis of case rates in Oxford and Oxfordshire. Particular focus on the impact students made when returning to the city after the holidays.

articles.title: Can population density really tell us anything about Covid?
articles.description: A look at how measuring population density at different scales can impact the way we understand transmission of viruses.

articles.title: Booster jabs for the over-30s will begin TOMORROW
articles.description: Some data analysis of case spreading rates during the height of the covid pandemic. Analysis conducted with national health and population data.

articles.title: University ignore tribunal ruling on “discriminatory” retirement policy
articles.description: Oxford University announces that it intends to continue enforcing a retirement policy which was ruled “highly discriminatory” by an employment tribunal.

articles.title: St Hilda’s abolishes chapel in favour of multi-faith space
articles.description: St Hilda's College Oxford announced that it would replace its college chapel with a multi-faith space.

articles.title: MP delivers petition to block St John’s quarry
articles.description: An MP delivered a petition in parliament to stop an Oxford college from building a quarry on its land in Warwickshire.

articles.title: Oscar Wilde’s Ring Returns to Magdalen College
articles.description: A solid gold ring given as a gift of friendship by Oscar Wilde to his friend William Ward has been returned to Magdalen College almost 20 years after it was stolen from the college library.
